com.googlecode.lanterna.input

Class Key

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.input.Key

  • public class Key
extends Object
    Represents a key pressed. Use getKind() to see if it's a normal alpha-numeric key or any special key. Currently the function keys F1 - F12 are not implemented. Also, sorry if the special keys are sort of european-language centered, that's unfortunately the only keyboard I have to test this with.
    Author:
    Martin
